navigation.navigationDescription: Navigate through the MC Shop system

request-form.title: Title
request-form.descriptionPlaceholderItem: Describe the specific item you need, its condition, enchantments, etc.
request-form.descriptionPlaceholderService: Describe the service you need, requirements, timeline, etc.
request-form.quantityPlaceholder: How many items do you need?

homepage.title: MC Shop
homepage.subtitle: Search for players and items across Minecraft shops

sign-in.title: Sign In
sign-in.description: Enter your Minecraft username and password to access MC Shop

sign-up.title: Sign Up
sign-up.description: Create your account to get started

stepTwo.title: Verify Account
stepTwo.description: Check your Minecraft chat for verification code
stepTwo.helpDescription: Enter the 6-digit code sent to {mcUsername} in Minecraft chat.

stepThree.title: Set Password
stepThree.description: Create a secure password for your account

stepFour.title: Registration Completed!
stepFour.description: Your account has been created successfully.
stepFour.greeting: Welcome, {mcUsername}! You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds...

shops-browse.title: Browse Shops
shops-browse.description: Discover shops from players around the server
shops-browse.searchPlaceholder: Search shops by player name, item, or keywords...
shops-browse.noShopsFound: No shops found matching your search criteria
shops-browse.foundShops: Found {count} shop{count, plural, one {} other {s}} matching your search
shops-browse.noActiveShops: There are currently no active shops on the server.
shops-browse.noResultsDescription: No shops match your search criteria. Try different keywords or browse all shops.
shops-browse.showingShops: Showing {count} active shop{count, plural, one {} other {s}}

shops-new.title: Create New Shop
shops-new.description: Set up your new Minecraft shop
shops-new.authRequiredDescription: Please login to create a shop.

form.locationHelp: Enter the coordinates where your shop is located in Minecraft. This helps other players find your shop.
form.isActive: Shop is active and visible to other players

help.title: Tips for creating a good shop:
help.tip1: Choose a clear, descriptive name that tells players what you sell
help.tip2: Add a helpful description explaining your shop's specialty
help.tip3: Include coordinates so players can easily find your shop
help.tip4: You can always edit these details later

toast.createdDescription: Your shop has been created successfully

form.isActive: Shop is active and visible to other players

deleteDialog.title: Delete Shop
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{shopName}"? This action cannot be undone. All shop items and data will be permanently removed.

error.title: Error
error.notFoundDescription: The shop you're looking for doesn't exist.
error.accessDeniedDescription: You don't have permission to edit this shop.

toast.updatedDescription: Your shop has been updated successfully
toast.deletedDescription: Your shop has been deleted successfully

shops-details.startAddingItems: Start adding items to your shop to attract customers.
shops-details.noItemsForSale: This shop doesn't have any items for sale yet.

shops-items-add.title: Add Item to Shop
shops-items-add.description: Add a new item to your shop with pricing and currency options.

form.cardDescription: Select a Minecraft item and set its price and currency type.
form.amountDescription: How many items are sold as a bundle (e.g., 32 iron ore)

toast.addFailed: Failed to add item to shop

shops-items-edit.title: Edit Shop Item
shops-items-edit.description: Update the pricing and availability for this item.

form.cardDescription: Update the price, amount, currency, and availability for this item.
form.amountHelp: How many items are sold as a bundle (e.g., 32 for a stack of iron ore)

deleteDialog.title: Remove Item from Shop
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove "{itemName}" from your shop? This action cannot be undone.

error.failedToLoadShopItem: Failed to load shop item details

toast.removeFailed: Failed to remove item from shop
toast.checkPermissions: You don't have permission to edit this shop item. Redirecting...

shops.title: My Shops
shops.authRequiredDescription: Please login to manage your shops.
shops.noShopsYetDescription: Create your first shop to start selling items to other players.

requests.title: Request Board
requests.description: Request items or services from other players

empty.openDescription: Be the first to create a request and start trading!
empty.negotiationDescription: Requests in negotiation will appear here once offers are accepted.
empty.acceptedDescription: Requests that have been agreed upon and are awaiting completion will appear here.
empty.completedDescription: Completed requests and transactions will appear here.
empty.myRequestsDescription: Create your first request to start trading!

error.generalError: An error occurred while loading requests. Please try again later.
error.generalErrorYours: An error occurred while loading your requests. Please try again later.
error.authRequired: Please log in to view your requests.

requests-new.title: Create New Request
requests-new.description: Request items or services from other players

form.cardDescription: Fill out the form below to create your request. Be specific about what you need.

footer.description: Your ultimate Minecraft shop administration platform. Manage and discover shops across your server with ease.
